Text: Palm Store Newsletter Vol Whats In Store brought to you by InSync Online Volume February Dear Jess The scent of cherry blossoms a warm breeze the crack of the bat against the ball Ahspring so near yet so far No need to wait to celebrate the rites of spring The new Palm i handheld is ready for a stroll now With its hip ergonomic design and wireless email and web capabilities the two of you will be inseparable Purchase the i by itself or as a Palm Store Special Deal The Mobile Bundle will quickly become your dontleavehomewithoutit companion Then find a nice bench in the shade and tap open Murder in Havana Politics money power and romance intersect in this latest eBook spy novel from Margaret Truman See you in March The InSync Online Team PRODUCT HIGHLIGHT Me Myself and i The Palm
